ygData.subject: Re: Some Verant feedback i got
ygData.msgSnippet: ... a fun list. I would never be good ... Your derogatory manner will not win you your point or earn you respect enough to be even listened too.  I have been
ygData.messageBody:
>
> WOW what a bunch of winning babys Christ...I thought this was going to be
a fun list. I would never be good
> enough NEVER!
>

Your derogatory manner will not win you your point or earn you respect
enough to be even listened too. I have been listening carefully to the
points provided and I have to admit the people asking for change have been
more eloquent and have made better points than 'you guys whine alot'. It
does seem from the preponderance of evidence that has been presented here
that there is some lack of balance. No one has said that the game is
unplayable as a wizard just that they need some improvement. Example last
night I was laughed at when I asked if any one wanted a level 12 wizard. (by
3 people over shout no less) If that is the opinion of the majority of the
populace in a game that is suppose to be group only, then I say we need
something to make us more valuable...

Rutreeii
Cazic-Thul
